DescriptionData.Title: Cinema Secrets Woochie Clown Noses (Small)
DescriptionData.Description: Very lightweight rubber noses in matte light red. Especially great for hobo and character clowns. Can be applied with spirit gum, latex, etc. For best results, place a cotton ball in the tip of larger noses to help maintain shape.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Apply grease/cream makeup to nose and set with powder to match makeup
Apply with spirit gum, latex, etc.
Place a cotton ball in the tip of larger noses to help maintain shape

DescriptionData.Title: Woochie World's Longest Noses
DescriptionData.Description: Woochie World's Longest Nose is a very long nose which transforms any normal face into a very silly face. The Woochie World's Longest Nose is a latex prosthetic nose that measures a whopping 6" long. The Longest Nose is very easy to apply using spirit gum (sold separately) and can be used again and again with proper care. For children 8 years and older.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint:
Cinema Secret products are produced in the United States and are FDA approved There are no hazardous byproducts in Cinema Secret products The materials that Cinema Secret uses in their products are of high cosmetic grade and compliant with global cosmetic guidelines
As with any cosmetic product, it is a good idea to try on a small patch of skin first to see if there are any adverse reactions Avoid the eye area and sensitive skin or skin that you might have under a doctors care

DescriptionData.Title: Woochie Slashed Eye
DescriptionData.Description: Woochie Prosthetics are high quality, light weight appliances that deliver the most realistic effects. They are hand painted and made with FDA approved ingredients safe to use on skin.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Not recommended if allergic to latex
Not recommended for children under 8 years

DescriptionData.Title: Mehron Adhesives Dots
DescriptionData.Description: Mehron's double-faced medical grade adhesive tape in round dots is a welcome alternative to messy glues. Their double-faced adhesive tape will keep every clown's nose in place. It goes on easy and comes off clean. 36 dots per pack.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: double-faced medical-grade adhesive tape in round dots
Goes on easy, comes off clean

DescriptionData.Title: Vanishing Cane Magic Trick
DescriptionData.Description: You twirl a cane between your fingers and even tap it on the floor to prove it's solid. While you hold the cane on each end, it instantaneously changes into two large silks (not included) or vanishes altogether! You will also need two (18 inch silks) or 24 inch silks to perform this effect.

DescriptionData.Title: Tote Smiley Change Bags
DescriptionData.Description: The Smiley Switch Bag by Sam Tee. These flat, colorful change bags are perfect for many silk changes (available on the (silks page)) or vanishes. Smiley Tote is approx. 9.5" tall x 8" wide;

DescriptionData.Title: Itty Bitty Change Bags
DescriptionData.Description: The Itty Bitty is our smallest traditional change bag. Just like our larger change bags, this wood handled velvet pouched bag is large enough to hold a silver dollar, small to medium silks, a mouthcoil, or a host of other small items you can find on our (Pocket Magic) page. Assorted colors, by Ickle Pickle.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Large enough to hold a silver dollar, small to medium silks, a mouth coil, or other small items

DescriptionData.Title: Egg Nest Magic Trick
DescriptionData.Description: This colorful and eye-catching trick makes a great impact - everyone likes to the chance to win something for free! Show your audience five colorful plastic Easter eggs, and slip a gold coin, dollar bill or a ring into the one of the eggs (without showing which color egg has the item). Four people are invited to reach into the bag without looking and remove an egg, and you take the last egg. Of course the egg left for you is the one with the the valuables! Also a great way to give something special to the birthday child. Directions and ideas included. Very easy to do. Need some (Silly Rings)?

DescriptionData.Title: Popcorn Dye Magic Box
DescriptionData.Description: This great utility item has so many uses. A cardboard popcorn box is shown empty. Suddenly, silks are magically produced from it! It can also be used to vanish silks or make them change color. Other small items can also be used in the box. The perfect vanish for (20th Century Silks).
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Magic item disappearing and re-appearing popcorn box

DescriptionData.Title: Santa in the Chimney Silk Routine
DescriptionData.Description: This occupies no space but works great! Includes a large decorated house silk and a smaller Santa silk. Ideal for a beautiful routine in silks. The Santa vanishes into the chimney but where? Maybe he got stuck! Magically, you pull him out but he's covered in soot! And where are the gifts? They're in the bag that you showed empty before you started. This can be done your way, using thumbtips, change bag, etc. An online demonstration video makes it easier!
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Ideal for a beautiful routine in silks.
It occupies no space but plays great!
Includes a large decorated house silk and a smaller Santa silk.

DescriptionData.Title: Tootsie Pops
DescriptionData.Description: One at a time, four Tootsie Roll pops are pulled from a bag, showing four different flavors. Pick two flavors for yourself to keep and hand the bag with the remaining two to a spectator. But then? They have disappeared! Magically they are in the other bag along with your pops! Now all four are handed out for audience to enjoy! Such a massive upgrade from the old flat plastic lollipop trick! An online demonstration video makes it easier!
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Includes a bag and four Tootsie Roll pops

DescriptionData.Title: Mehron Makeup Remover Lotion (4.5 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: A liquid makeup that helps break down creme makeup quickly and gently, leaving your skin soft! 4.5 oz. size.

DescriptionData.Title: Woochie Cut Set EZ FX Kit
DescriptionData.Description: Woochie Prosthetics are high quality, light weight appliances that deliver the most realistic effects. They are hand painted and made with FDA approved ingredients safe to use on skin.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Not recommended if allergic to latex
Not recommended for children under 8 years

DescriptionData.Title: Woochie 3-D Burn
DescriptionData.Description: Woochie Prosthetics are high quality, light weight appliances that deliver the most realistic effects. They are hand painted and made with FDA approved ingredients safe to use on skin.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Not recommended if allergic to latex
Not recommended for children under 8 years

DescriptionData.Title: ProKnows Super Stick Double Sided Tape
DescriptionData.Description: A half inch by 100 inch roll of double-sided adhesive film with great holding power. It is water resistant, ideal for sensitive skin and is not affected by freezing. Just cut it to fit your needs.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: ProKnows super stick double sided tape

DescriptionData.Title: ProKnows Latex Adhesive (1 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: Designed specially to work with all ProKnows noses and tips. 1 oz. size. Clean your nose or remove build-up of adhesive in your clown nose with ProKnows Dissolvent.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Designed to work with all ProKnows noses and tips
Item can't be shipped in the winter months

DescriptionData.Title: Cinema Secrets Flesh (Lt Tan) Latex Adhesive (1 oz)
DescriptionData.Description:
Cinema Secrets Flesh Latex is a natural rubber adhesive that has a tint of flesh tone, making it great for blending the edges of bald caps and other latex appliances or creating wrinkle effects on skin. 1 ounce size.
Please note that we cannot ship liquid latex items in the winter months, as freezing will damage them.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each 1 ounce Cinema Secrets Liquid Latex will give 10 to 50 applications, depending on use You can apply dozens of prosthetics, or do 1-2 skin effects

DescriptionData.Title: 5" Round -100ct - Jeweltone Assortment
DescriptionData.Description: Professional Quality 5" Balloons. Great for parties, fairs and festivals. Includes: Quartz Purple, Jewel Magenta, Sapphire Blue, Emerald Green, Ruby Red, Citrine Yellow, Mandarin Orange and Diamond Clear. 100 per bag.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Great for parties, fairs and festivals

DescriptionData.Title: 5" Round - 100ct - Standard Assortment
DescriptionData.Description: Imprinted 5 inch round balloons. Use 'em alone as giveaways or to create unique balloon sculptures. White 5 inch rounds are great for character eyes. Standard Assortment may include: Yellow, Orange, Pink, Red, Dark Blue, Green and White. 100 per bag.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Traditional Assortment may include: Yellow, Orange, Pink, Red, Dark Blue, Green and White

DescriptionData.Title: 260Q - 100ct Emerald Green
DescriptionData.Description: Professional quality balloons for shaping into animals and flowers. Great for parties, fairs and festivals. Qualatex skinny pencil balloons, 2" wide and 60" Emerald Green.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: For shaping into animals and flowers
Great for parties, fairs and festival
Qualatex skinny pencil balloons, 2" wide and 60"

DescriptionData.Title: 260Q - 100ct Neon Green
DescriptionData.Description: Professional quality balloons for shaping into animals and flowers. Great for parties, fairs and festivals. Qualatex Twisting balloons, 2" wide and 60" long.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Qualatex Twisting balloons, 2" wide and 60" long
Great for parties, fairs and festivals

DescriptionData.Title: 260Q - 100ct Caribbean Blue
DescriptionData.Description: Professional quality balloons for shaping into animals and flowers. Great for parties, fairs and festivals. Qualatex Twisting balloons, 2" wide and 60" long.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Qualatex Twisting balloons, 2" wide and 60" long
Great for parties, fairs and festivals

DescriptionData.Title: 260Q - 100ct Tropical Teal
DescriptionData.Description: Professional quality balloons for shaping into animals and flowers. Great for parties, fairs and festivals. Qualatex Twisting balloons, 2" wide and 60" long.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Qualatex Twisting balloons, 2" wide and 60" long
Great for parties, fairs and festivals

DescriptionData.Title: 260Q - 100ct Sapphire Blue
DescriptionData.Description: Professional quality balloons for shaping into animals and flowers. Great for parties, fairs and festivals. Qualatex Twisting balloons, 2" wide and 60" long.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Qualatex Twisting balloons, 2" wide and 60" long
Great for parties, fairs and festivals

DescriptionData.Title: ProKnows Clown Nose Tips - T5 Glitter Heart (Red)
DescriptionData.Description: ProKNOWS Clown Nose with a foam interior and glitter exterior. Heart shaped tip.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Made with a foam interior and vinyl coating

DescriptionData.Title: Clown Antics Jest String Clown Noses (1/pk)
DescriptionData.Description: These simple string noses are made of bright red, high gloss plastic 1 1/2" half spheres with elastic string. Fits on all adults, kids 2 years and up, and noses of all shapes. No adhesive required, doesn't fall off!
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Fits on all adults, kids 2 years and up, and noses of all shapes

DescriptionData.Title: HMS Naso Squeeze Clown Noses
DescriptionData.Description: Medium-sized, soft molded red vinyl clown nose that needs no strings or glue! Just squeeze it open and it gently grips your nose. Great for giveaways or quick changes!
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Medium-sized, soft molded red vinyl clown nose that needs no strings or glue!
Just squeeze it open and it gently grips your nose

DescriptionData.Title: Fun Express Light-up Flashing Clown Noses w/ String
DescriptionData.Description: Light up clown or reindeer nose secured with a black cord. To use, just remove from packaging, strap it on, and give it a tap to start the red light blinking. Self-contained, batteries included.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: To use, just remove from packaging, strap it on, and give it a tap to start the red light blinking

DescriptionData.Title: Clown Antics Clown Nose Prescription
DescriptionData.Description:
Clown Nose Prescription is a quick and easy way to feel better on a down day! Includes 2 foam clown noses, one for yourself and one to help a friend, companion, family member or anyone who think might be able to get out of their blues with some extra fun.
Please note that this product includes small parts and is NOT recommended for children under 3 years.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Includes 2 noses and get well gift card
Great to get over a moody day
Great gifts for friends and family
Not recommended for children under 3 years

DescriptionData.Title: ProKnows Super Stick Adhesive Strips
DescriptionData.Description: Double-sided adhesive strips for an extremely strong yet gentle hold for noses. Comes in 3 inch x 1/2 inch strips, 25 per pack.

DescriptionData.Title: Mehron Spirit Gum Adhesive Remover (1 oz)
DescriptionData.Description:
Mehron Spirit Gum Remover is made to be gentler on your skin than other gum removers. Spirit Gum Remover by Mehron is a specially developed solvent to gently remove makeup adhesives such as Spirit Gum Liquid Adhesive from the skin. Mehron Spirit Gum Remover is used throughout the Performance Industry because Performers recognize the safe effective formula of Mehron Spirit Gum Remover will not damage the skin.
Please note that this item is flammable and cannot be shipped via Air or International shipping.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each 1 ounce Mehron Spirit Gum Remover will give 1 to 5 applications, depending on use

DescriptionData.Title: Mehron Admed Adhesive (0.5 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: Mehron's AdMed Liquid Adhesive is a clear, synthetic adhesive that stands up to the toughest performance conditions. AdMed Liquid Adhesive is used by Professional Clowns to secure their Clown Nose and by Makeup Artists and Special Effects Artists for prosthesis and Bald Caps. AdMed Liquid Adhesive is perspiration resistant and adheres through the most active performances.

DescriptionData.Title: Ruby Red Stickable Gems
DescriptionData.Description: Ruby Red Self Adhesive Peel & Stick Gems come in sheets of 100 acrylic gems in an assortment of 6 colors and 3 shapes. The smallest self adhesive jewel is 3/16 in in diameter and the tear drop shape is 1/4 in x 3/8 in in size. Just peel and stick the gem right onto the skin. Use them like a bindi on the face or as self adhesive body jewels as a ring, bracelet or necklace. Each sheet of self adhesive jewels has 100 jewels.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Just slide off the plastic and stick to add depth to your face painting creations!

DescriptionData.Title: Mehron Blood Red FX Tooth Paint (0.25 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: Mehron Tooth FX is a non-toxic, temporary color for teeth that lets you add just the right effect for your character by coloring selected teeth. Mehron Tooth FX dries quickly and last for hours. Each Tooth FX Tooth Paint comes in a 0.25 ounce container and includes instructions.

DescriptionData.Title: Mehron Gold FX Tooth Paint (0.25 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: Mehron Tooth FX is a non-toxic, temporary color for teeth that lets you add just the right effect for your character by coloring selected teeth. Mehron Tooth FX dries quickly and last for hours. Each Tooth FX Tooth Paint comes in a 0.25 ounce container and includes instructions.

DescriptionData.Title: Scarecrow Viper Split Fangs
DescriptionData.Description: Scarecrow Viper Fangs are easy to customize without any need for messy adhesives, glues or putty. Once customized they are easy to apply and remove.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Easy to use custom fangs for most realistic effects for halloween or entertainment
Customized Fangs can be reused multiple times
Easy to pop in and pop out
Non-toxic and safe to use on teeth

DescriptionData.Title: Scarecrow Bucky Teeth Cap
DescriptionData.Description: Scarecrow Bucky Teeth are easy to customize without any need for messy adhesives, glues or putty. Once customized they are easy to apply and remove.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Easy to use bucky teeth cap for most realistic effects for costumes such as clown, hillybilly, cute angel etc.
Customized caps can be reused multiple times
Easy to pop in and pop out
Non-toxic and safe to use on teeth

DescriptionData.Title: Scarecrow Fangs Customizing Kit Refill
DescriptionData.Description: Scarecrow Customizing Kit Refill is a great accessory to use in case you need to correct the mold already created.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Easy to use to customize Scarecrow fangs
Non-toxic and safe to use on teeth

DescriptionData.Title: Giant Rubber Ears
DescriptionData.Description: These huge, soft vinyl ears fit over your own ears for a super comical look! Ears are about 4 1/2 inches tall and fit best if your own ears have detached earlobes. Also great fun to put over the end of your prop stethoscope for hospital use. Sold in pairs.

DescriptionData.Title: Woochie Gouge Set EZ FX Kit
DescriptionData.Description: Woochie Prosthetics are high quality, light weight appliances that deliver the most realistic effects. They are hand painted and made with FDA approved ingredients safe to use on skin.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Not recommended if allergic to latex
Not recommended for children under 8 years

DescriptionData.Title: Woochie Skull EZ FX Kits
DescriptionData.Description: Woochie Skull EZ Kit is an face paint set that turns any head into a long-dead skull head. The Woochie Skull Kit comes with face paint instructions, .08 ounce of skull white, yellow and black face paint colors, 2 sponge wedges, .5 ounce of powder, one powder puff. You can easily face paint on that dead for a long time look.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint:
Cinema Secret products are produced in the United States and are FDA approved There are no hazardous byproducts in Cinema Secret products The materials that Cinema Secret uses in their products are of high cosmetic grade and compliant with global cosmetic guidelines
As with any cosmetic product, it is a good idea to try on a small patch of skin first to see if there are any adverse reactions Avoid the eye area and sensitive skin or skin that you might have under a doctors care

DescriptionData.Title: 11 Inch Round Polka Dot Balloons Assortment, 100/Pack
DescriptionData.Description: Imprinted 11 inch round balloons. Use 'em alone as giveaways or to create unique balloon sculptures. Assortment may include: Orange, Lime Green, Wild Berry, Chocolate Brown and Robin's Egg Blue. 100 per bag.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Assortment may include: Orange, Lime Green, Wild Berry, Chocolate Brown and Robin's Egg Blue

DescriptionData.Title: Caterpillar Balloons (50/bag)
DescriptionData.Description: Betallatex Caterpillar balloons have an enlarged head and two antennas. Use as a Caterpillar or use the antennas for attachment points for other balloons, etc. Assortment may include: Lilac, Green, Pink, Yellow, Orange. Sold in bags of 50.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Assortment may include: Lilac, Green, Pink, Yellow, Orange

DescriptionData.Title: 5" Smiley Balloon - Yellow Only (100/bag)
DescriptionData.Description: Imprinted 5 inch round balloons. Use 'em alone as giveaways or to create unique balloon sculptures. Yellow with a black smiley face. 100 per bag.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Yellow with black smiley face print

DescriptionData.Title: 5" Round Balloons - Google Eyes/Octopus (100/bag)
DescriptionData.Description: Imprinted 5 inch round balloons. Use 'em alone as giveaways or to create unique balloon sculptures. Yellow with a black smiley face. Assortment may include: Red, Orange, Yellow, Pink and Pale Blue. 100 per bag.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Assortment may include: Red, Orange, Yellow, Pink and Pale Blue

DescriptionData.Title: 5" Round - 100ct - Pale Blue
DescriptionData.Description: Professional Quality 5" Balloons. Great for parties, fairs and festivals. 100 per bag.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Great for parties, fairs and festivals

DescriptionData.Title: 5" Round -100ct - Quartz Purple
DescriptionData.Description: Professional Quality 5" Balloons. Great for parties, fairs and festivals. 100 per bag.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Great for parties, fairs and festivals

DescriptionData.Title: 4 Pocket Balloon Apron
DescriptionData.Description: This sturdy apron has 4-5 pockets that can easily hold a hand pump and lots of balloons! 3 pleated front pockets give extra pocket room to this extremely handy, 21" x 14" apron. Giant waist pocket with 2 diagonal openings at the hips which meet in the middle to form one huge pocket, which you can divide by stitching if you prefer. Can be used by balloon twisters of all types! Decorate with fabric paint or patches for a personalized accessory! Sturdy straps with plastic clips attached at waist. Available in black.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Plastic clips on sturdy waist straps

DescriptionData.Title: Woochie Large Pig Noses
DescriptionData.Description: Woochie Large Pig Nose turns any human child into a barnyard animal. The Woochie Large Pig Nose is a latex prosthetic nose. The Pig Nose comes in two pieces, the nose piece and the chin piece. The pig nose piece is 2" long. This Pig nose is easily applied using spirit gum (sold separately) and with proper care, can be used again and again. Please use with children 8 years and older.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint:
Cinema Secret products are produced in the United States and are FDA approved There are no hazardous byproducts in Cinema Secret products The materials that Cinema Secret uses in their products are of high cosmetic grade and compliant with global cosmetic guidelines

DescriptionData.Title: Woochie Space Ear Tips - Large
DescriptionData.Description: Woochie Small Space Ear Tips are very easy to apply to create hobbit ears, elf ears or alien ears. Woochie Elf Ears are latex prosthetic ears and measure about 2 inches length. Easy to apply and perfect for creating a realistic elf look for Halloween. For children 8 years and older. Spirit Gum and Spirit Gum Remover not included.

DescriptionData.Title: Jim Howle Grease Makeup - Auguste #5 Orange/Pink (2 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: Jim Howle Grease Makeup Kit is made with cottonseed and soybean oils, and various pigments. Highly pigmented makeup, a little goes a long way! 2 ounce size.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Made with cottonseed and soybean oils, and various pigments

DescriptionData.Title: 5" Round - 100ct - Pink
DescriptionData.Description: Professional Quality 5" Balloons. Great for parties, fairs and festivals. 100 per bag.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Great for parties, fairs and festivals

DescriptionData.Title: 5" Round - 100ct - Yellow
DescriptionData.Description: Professional Quality 5" Balloons. Great for parties, fairs and festivals. 100 per bag.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Great for parties, fairs and festivals

DescriptionData.Title: 5" Round - 100ct - White
DescriptionData.Description: Professional Quality 5" Balloons. Great for parties, fairs and festivals. 100 per bag.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Great for parties, fairs and festivals

DescriptionData.Title: Dual Baffle Jumbo Balloon Hand Pumps
DescriptionData.Description: Heavy duty, excellent quality dual-action (2 way) hand pump. Please note: this pump is approximately 20 inches long, and does require some additional upper body strength to use, or you can brace it against the table/chair on which you're working.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Dual baffle jumbo balloon hand pump
Requires good upper body strength to use

DescriptionData.Title: Tie-A-Balloon
DescriptionData.Description:
Have you ever had to tie dozens, or even hundreds of balloons for an event? Tie-A-Balloon is a very simple, yet effective and affordable device that can help make your balloon tying experiences go from being painful to being fun! Invented to solve the problem of pinched fingers and leaking air or popping, this ingenious device allows you to quickly and efficiently tie balloons--no accidental pops or deflations.
Just wrap the inflated balloon around the device to make an loop, tuck the nozzle through, slip the balloon off and the balloon is tied with no pinched fingers. Tie-A-Balloon (formerly Knot-A-Balloon) lets you tie balloons faster and without discomfort!
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Handy balloon tying device makes tying balloons effortless
Just wrap the nozzle around the device, tuck the nozzle through and slip the balloon off
Tie-A-Balloon lets you tie balloons faster and without discomfort!

DescriptionData.Title: The Balloon Tool - Instant Balloon Tying Tool
DescriptionData.Description: The Balloon Tool easily ties air or helium filled balloons, regardless of age, physical challenges or long fingernails. The Balloon Tool can also attach a string or ribbon as you tie the knot, plus curl the ribbon without putting The Balloon Tool down. Into decorating? Easily build balloon bouquets or arches. It will even knot two balloons together, as simply as one! Can be used with equal ease by righties and lefties! See how easy it is! Watch a video of how to use the Balloon Tool with (Quick Time) or (Windows Media Player).
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Can also attach strings and curl ribbons
Good for left or right handed users

DescriptionData.Title: Balloon Menu - Echevarria
DescriptionData.Description: From Eli Echevarria, the author and illustrator of "The Ultimate Balloon Twisters Guide" series, comes one of the handiest tools a balloon twister could ever ask for: The Balloon Menu! The Balloon Menu is a fantastic restaurant style leather menu featuring colorful illustrations of 18 popular balloon designs. It is a perfect way for your customers to decide which balloon they'd like while they wait their turn in line, and a great gimmick for twisters who work restaurants. Instructions for all 18 menu designs are included in "The Ultimate Balloon Twisters Guide, Vol 1," available on both the book and the CD-ROM (see below). One of the most popular features of "The Ultimate Balloon Twister's Guide, Vol 2" is the chapter on obtaining restaurant work as a balloon twister, in which Eli describes the profitable benefits of using a menu such as this.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Great gimmick for restaurant balloon twisters

DescriptionData.Title: Twist-N-Flate Pumps
DescriptionData.Description: The Twist-N-Flate is please to present a portable, battery-powered, high-pressure inflator specifically designed for most all sizes of modeling balloons. It is a great tool for Twisters, Clowns, and Professional Entertainers. It provides years of reliable and long term use. It easily inflates 160's, 260's and 360 sized modeling balloons without pre-stretching. High-powered battery will run about 3 hours, enough to inflate up to 500 balloons. Inflates most all modeling balloons in seconds for maximum performance. "Quick Change" battery compartment allows for easy battery replacement in the field. Battery can be charged during use for extended performance. Can be shouldered mounted for either right or left hand use. Universal nozzle tip is designed to fit most all types and sizes of modeling balloons. Premium quality engineering and materials have been used in the Twist-N-Flate for lasting performance and reliability.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Battery-powered (3 hour charge/approximately 500 balloons) Can be charged during use
Easily inflates 160's, 260's, and 360 model balloons without prestretching, nozzles fits most types and sizes of modeling balloons
Shoulder mounted for left or right hand use

DescriptionData.Title: Mac Classic Balloon Floor Pumps
DescriptionData.Description:
This MACPUMP Classic Floor Pump is made up of 4 inch diameter PVC. Inflates a 260 with one stroke. Weighs just 8 lbs! Transporting is easy because of the nylon strap incorporated in the design.
Pump height is 33 inches, reaches to 60 inches when extended on the "up stroke." Base size is approximately 9 in X 10 in.
This is a drop ship item. It will ship separately from the rest of your order. Please allow up to 2 weeks for delivery.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Inflates a 260 balloon with one stroke
Ships directly from manufacturer, additional ship time required

DescriptionData.Title: Mini Mac Light Balloon Pumps
DescriptionData.Description:
As the name implies, this is a light weight, full size manual pump with all the power of the standard pump, but lighter! The Mini Mac Light is a 4.5 lb manual balloon pump and comes with a carrying strap to make transporting this great little pump around easy. It is made of durable PVC and stands 34" tall and can fully inflate a 260 in one stroke. Great little pump for any venue.
This is a drop ship item. It will ship separately from the rest of your order. Please allow up to 2 weeks for delivery.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Mini Mac Light manual balloon floor pump
Fully inflates a 260 balloon with one stroke
Ships directly from manufacturer, additional ship time required

DescriptionData.Title: Balloon Palm Pumps - 160
DescriptionData.Description: The Palm Pumps are squeezebulb style balloon pumps that will accomodate either 160s or 260s. With each squeeze, a handful of air puffs into the balloon (and helps build up your forearms!). These pocket-sized pumps are more work (20-30 squeezes per balloon), but are very small and convenient.

DescriptionData.Title: Balloon Palm Pumps - 260
DescriptionData.Description: The Palm Pumps are squeezebulb style balloon pumps that will accomodate either 160s or 260s. With each squeeze, a handful of air puffs into the balloon (and helps build up your forearms!). These pocket-sized pumps are more work (20-30 squeezes per balloon), but are very small and convenient.

DescriptionData.Title: Clown Balloon - Juggles (1/pack)
DescriptionData.Description: Juggles the Clown Balloon is a fun clown balloon with double side images. These clown balloons are self sealing mylar balloons and are sold unpackaged. Juggles the Clown Balloon is 33" tall. Sold individually. Note: these clown balloons are NOT inflated when delivered. You can inflate them with regular air or helium (look for local rentals).

DescriptionData.Title: Jim Howle Clown White Makeup (3 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: Made with cottonseed and soybean oils and titanium white. No additives, so it's great for sensitive skin. Great Highly pigmented makeup, a little goes a long way and it gives excellent coverage of "nooks and crannies"!
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Made with cottonseed and soybean oils
No additives, Great for sensitive skin

DescriptionData.Title: Jim Howle Clown White Makeup (6 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: Made with cottonseed and soybean oils and titanium white. No additives, so it's great for sensitive skin. Great Highly pigmented makeup, a little goes a long way and it gives excellent coverage of "nooks and crannies"!
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Made with cottonseed and soybean oils
No additives, Great for sensitive skin

DescriptionData.Title: Clown Balloon - Circus Tent (1/pack)
DescriptionData.Description: Circus Tent Clown Balloon is a fun clown balloon with double side images. These clown balloons are self sealing mylar balloons and are sold unpackaged. Circus Tent Clown Balloon is 23" tall. Sold individually. Note: these clown balloons are NOT inflated when delivered. You can inflate them with regular air or helium (look for local rentals).

DescriptionData.Title: Clown Balloon - Striped (1/pack)
DescriptionData.Description: Clown Balloon is a fun clown balloon with double side images. These clown balloons are self sealing mylar balloons and are sold unpackaged. Striped Clown Balloon is 30" tall. Sold individually. Note: these clown balloons are NOT inflated when delivered. You can inflate them with regular air or helium (look for local rentals).

DescriptionData.Title: Clown Balloon - Birthday Hat (1/pack)
DescriptionData.Description: Birthday Hat Clown Balloon is a fun clown balloon with double side images. These clown balloons are self sealing mylar balloons and are sold unpackaged. Birthday Hat Clown Balloon is 28" tall. Sold individually. Note: these clown balloons are NOT inflated when delivered. You can inflate them with regular air or helium (look for local rentals).

DescriptionData.Title: ProFace Gala Grease Makeup - Black (1.3 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: ProFace by Leon McBride is now producing castor-oil based "Gala" Competition Grease Makeup, with smooth, excellent coverage and a built-in anti-perspirant! Will fill the "nooks and crannies" of the older performer, resulting in a smoother surface. Gala Black, 1.3 oz. size.

DescriptionData.Title: ProFace Clown White Makeup (8 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: The original ProFace Makeup goes on easily and will last up to 12 hours - a makeup that can withstand different climates from hot to cold and the humidity that goes with it. Added sunscreen for protection. 8 ounce size.

DescriptionData.Title: ProFace Clown White Makeup (1.6 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: The original ProFace Makeup goes on easily and will last up to 12 hours - a makeup that can withstand different climates from hot to cold and the humidity that goes with it. Added sunscreen for protection. 1.6 ounce size.

DescriptionData.Title: Jim Howle Grease Makeup - Deep Red (0.75 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: Creamy makeup is easy to apply with a brush. Made with cottonseed and soybean oils and irgazine red. Highly pigmented makeup, a little goes a long way! Approximately 3/4 oz. size.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Made with cottonseed, soybean oils, and irgazine red

DescriptionData.Title: Jim Howle Grease Makeup - Bright Red (0.75 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: Creamy makeup is easy to apply with a brush. Made with cottonseed and soybean oils and irgazine red. Highly pigmented makeup, a little goes a long way! Approximately 3/4 oz. size.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Made with cottonseed, soybean oils, and irgazine red

DescriptionData.Title: Jim Howle Grease Makeup - Tramp Grey (2 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: Creamy makeup is easy to apply with a brush. Made with cottonseed and soybean oils, ultra blue, lamp black and/or cadmium red. Highly pigmented makeup, a little goes a long way! 2 oz. tub.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Made with cottonseed and soybean oils, ultra blue, lamp black and/or cadmium red

DescriptionData.Title: Jim Howle Grease Makeup - Ultra Blue (0.75 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: Creamy makeup is easy to apply with a brush. Made with cottonseed and soybean oils, ultra blue, lamp black and/or cadmium red. Highly pigmented makeup, a little goes a long way! Approximately 3/4 oz. size.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Made with cottonseed and soybean oils, ultra blue, lamp black and/or cadmium red

DescriptionData.Title: Jim Howle Grease Makeup - Smart Black (0.75 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: Creamy makeup is easy to apply with a brush. Made with cottonseed and soybean oils, ultra blue, lamp black and/or cadmium red. Highly pigmented makeup, a little goes a long way! Approximately 3/4 oz. size.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Made with cottonseed and soybean oils, ultra blue, lamp black and/or cadmium red

DescriptionData.Title: Jim Howle Grease Makeup - Auguste #SD (2 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: Jim Howle Grease Makeup Kit is made with cottonseed and soybean oils, and various pigments. Highly pigmented makeup, a little goes a long way! 2 ounce size.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Made with cottonseed and soybean oils, and various pigments

DescriptionData.Title: Jim Howle Auguste Grease Foundation (2 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: Made with cottonseed and soybean oils, irgazine red and permanent yellow. Highly pigmented makeup, a little goes a long way! Approximately 2 ounce size.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Made with cottonseed and soybean oils, irgazine red and permanent yellow

DescriptionData.Title: Jim Howle Clown Makeup Palettes (5 Colors)
DescriptionData.Description: Jim Howle 5 Color Makeup Kit is a great kit for new clowns, when you're on the road or if you'd like to try Jim's makeup. Includes Jim Howle's White, Black, Blue, Bright Red and a medium Auguste shade. Made with cottonseed and soybean oils, and various pigments. Highly pigmented makeup, a little goes a long way! 2.25 size.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: 5-colors (White, Black, Blue, Bright Red and a medium Auguste shade)
Made with cottonseed, soybean oils, and various pigments

DescriptionData.Title: Jim Howle Grease Makeup - Auguste Light Red-Brown #7 (2 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: Made with cottonseed and soybean oils, irgazine red and permanent yellow. Highly pigmented makeup, a little goes a long way! Approximately 2 ounce size.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Jim Howle light red-brown face paint
Made with cottonseed and soybean oils, irgazine red and permanent yellow

DescriptionData.Title: ProFace Gala Grease Makeup - White (1.3 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: ProFace by Leon McBride is now producing castor-oil based "Gala" Competition Grease Makeup, with smooth, excellent coverage and a built-in anti-perspirant! Will fill the "nooks and crannies" of the older performer, resulting in a smoother surface. Apple White users, try ProFace Gala Competition White! Gala White, 1.3 oz. size.
